ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.016: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, E of Ponta Delgada, Ponta de Rosto do Cao; 37°44'N 25°38'W; rocky shore with tide pools and large basin; shore- and snork.; 23.ix.1979
AV.610609: France, dep. Var, pen. Presqu'ile de Giens, Port du Niel (= 1 km SW of Giens); 9.vi.1961
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.091: Canary Islands, E of Lanzarote; 29°08'N 13°25'W; depth 55-82 m, coarse sand; triangular dredge; 22.v.1980
AV.690910: Italy, Sicilia, prov. Agrigento, Sciacca; 10.ix.1969
AV.690910: Italy, Sicilia, prov. Agrigento, Sciacca; 10.ix.1969
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.059: SE of Madeira; 32°42'N 16°44'W; depth 108 m, sand; van Veen grab; 20.x.1978
RU.790513: France, Corse, 6 km W of Ajaccio (halfway Ajaccio/la Parata); 13.v.1979
AV.620617o: Yugoslavia, Hrvatska, Ostri Rat(= Punta Mika, 2 km NW of Zadar);17.vi.1962
HH.8804p: Spain, prov. Cádiz, Torre de la Peña, (± 10 km N of Tarifa); beach collected shell-grit; iv.1988
